name: Musical Madness (EnzoVC)
description:
MUSICAL MADNESS It is a game based on the old game called “Asteroids” but with many modifications.

This game you embody a space musician who has to defend himself from the musical space that is full of danger and bad music.

MOVE, SHOOT and use the POWER UPS to defend yourself from the records with the worst music ever created and from the instrument that dominated many planets.

Will you be able to survive this great adventure?
